rule.name: syntax
rule.fail-message: test.property did not pass syntax validation

rule.name: syntax
rule.description: Checks application.base.path.linux is a valid unix path syntax.
rule.fail-message: application.base.path.linux did not pass validation. For unix systems the path needs to look like /dir1/dir2/dir3. There can be no spaces in the path, if there are any please rename the directories to not include spaces (maybe replace with _ ?).

rule.name: value-checker
rule.fail-message: application.base.path.linux failed value check. * / * /usr * /opt * no spaces * no \

rule.name: syntax
rule.description: Checks application.base.path.windows is a valid window path syntax.
rule.fail-message: application.base.path.windows did not pass validation. For windows systems the path needs to look like c:/dir1/dir2/dir3. Which means you should use "/" instead of "\". And Java programs often have problems with spaces in directory (or file) names so there can be no spaces in the path, chose a directory without spaces in it. Therefore we recommend not using "any directory under "Documents and Settings".

rule.name: value-checker
rule.fail-message: application.base.path.windows failed value check. Windows * x:/ (x is any char) * x:/win.* (case insensitive)

rule.name: value
rule.description: Checks authentication.type is the valid syntax.
rule.fail-message: authentication.type did not pass validation. Must be set to db or ldap.

rule.name: syntax
rule.description: Checks cacore-sdk.binaries.file is the valid syntax.
rule.fail-message: cacore-sdk.binaries.file did not pass validation. Cannot contain spaces, \ or / or must be null.

rule.name: syntax
rule.description: Checks cacore-sdk.binaries.relative.dir is the valid syntax.
rule.fail-message: cacore-sdk.binaries.relative.dir did not pass validation. Cannot contain spaces, \ or / or must be null.

rule.name: syntax
rule.description: Checks cacore-sdk.required is the valid syntax.
rule.fail-message: cacore-sdk.required did not pass validation. Can be true, false or null.

rule.name: value
rule.description: Checks cacore-sdk.required is the valid syntax.
rule.fail-message: cacore-sdk.required did not pass validation. Can be true, false or null.
